message_intro_one: A charitable platform for borrowing various medical equipment.
message_intro_two: The equipment available in the application is varied and includes all devices destined for home health care use.
message_intro_three: View your previous compensations with one click.
message_intro_four: Alerts will be sent to you.
label_sign_in_using: Sign in using the username and the password
label_agree_terms: By clicking "Continue", you agree to the terms of use and the privacy policy.
label_sms_expires_in: SMS code will be expired in :
message_chifa_card_01: Please use this code for your pharmaceutical purchases
message_chifa_card_02: This code is only valid once at your pharmacist.

label_language_support: Available in Arabic, English, and French.
error_attempts_number: Maximum number of attempts is exceeded
error_same_phone_number: This phone number is already in use!
label_confirm_close_app: Do you really want to close the app?
label_sms_will_be_sent: If your phone number is corret, a new password will be sent to you via SMS.
text_terms_of_use:
The insured is obliged to:
- Provide accurate information, as requested in the registration form.
- Protect his password and not share it with a third party. Any disclosure of the password, whatever its form, is prohibited.
- Report to us a malfunction or any error that has occurred.
label_hospitalisation: Was it necessary to go to the hospital?
error_start_end_date: Ending date must be greater than starting date
error_short_password: Password must be at least 8 characters
label_sick_leave_sent: Sick leave request sent with success
label_confirm_send_body: By clicking the send button, you confirm that all provided information are correct
label_cnas_address: Route des Deux Bassins Ben Aknoun.

message_chifa_card_03: Use the Chifa Virtual card to purchase medicines from the contracted pharmacists
